Title: PowerPoint Timeline Control
Description:
PowerPoint Timeline Control makes it easier to use use with the PowerPoint presentation time control, slide to slide, even when the application is paused.It's developed in .NET 4.0 Framework with c# and VSTO.

Minimal Version of PowerPoint : 2010
HomeWiki:
Welcome to PowerPoint Timeline Control!

Version English ~ Version Portuguese - Brazil


Project Resume

PowerPoint Timeline Control makes it easier to use PowerPoint in their presentations. Control the time slide by slide, even when the application is paused or stoped!.  It is developed in. NET 4.0 Framework with C # and VSTO.

Pre-Requirements

  • Microsoft PowerPoint 2010
  • Microsoft. Framework Net 4.0

Get Started

  • Download the latest release

Architecture

  • WCF namedPipe
  • Winform
  • Ribbon
  • VSTO

Project Features

  • Shows a time bar in his presentation (at the top or bottom of the screen)
  • Opens and maintains the link to the 5 last presentations
  • Sets the time the position of the bar and the title for each slide
  • It automatically synchronizes the slides and
  • Set up to 5 alerts time with custom message
  • Configures the color bar and text temli time
  • Watch with a click on the bar the time elapsed and remaining balance according to the last slide shown
  • Suggest a title slide
  • Available languages​​: Portuguese (Brazil) and English according to the O.S version and PowerPoint
